reporter-output.line: Setting Environment to: PROD
Environment: PROD
Open url 'http://qa2stg.publisher.nbcuni.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 05fb02eaed184b9 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the text 'Draft' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post f6f5d40b619a4c0 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the text 'Review' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 97da79e6729f48d has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the text 'Published' is present in the work bench info block.
